21375.「元ポツコン２号じゃねえですかッ！\n いいところに 来ましたッ！\n ちょっと:
Well, well! If it isn't Ex-Junkey #2!
You came at a great time! Check this out!

21376.「こいつは あの遺跡で拾ってきた\n 魔神兵とかいうガラクタの 一部なんですがね:
This heap of junk right here's an old Urbea
Aztech. If I sit here, like this...

21377.「イタタタッ！ 見てくだせえッ！\n とがった部分が しりっぺたの先に当たって…:
YEOUCH! See, look?! This pointy part stabs
you right in the behind... And it was all
like, "Ouch, ouch!"

21378.「ここにある たいがいのもんは\n イスぐらいには なりますが\n こいつは イ:
Most of the stuff here's at least good enough
to be used as a chair, but can't even say
that much for this thing...

21379.「こりゃ正真正銘の ガラクタでごぜえますよッ！\n こんな すばらしい物に めぐ:
This is the real deal! Junk with a capital J!
I gotta be the happiest Dwarf in Dwachakka
to find somethin' so useless!

21384.「わわっ！ ダ ダストンさまっ！\n こいつ ガラクタのくせに しゃべってますよ:
W-whoa! Did you see that, Mr. Duston?!
The junk, it speaks!!

21385.「エネルギー限界。\n 凍眠室 内部 危険。凍眠室 内部 危険……。:
ENERGY DEPLETED. ERROR DETECTED IN
CRYOSTATIS CHAMBER. ERROR DETECTED...

21386.「緊急回避 装置 起動。\n 凍眠機能…… 解除 シマス。:
EMERGENCY PROGRAM ACTIVATED.
EXITING CRYOSTASIS FUNCTION...

21387.「さ さすがの わしでも\n 死体は 勘弁でごぜえますよ……？:
E-even I draw the line at corpses,
ya know...!

21391.「……ほほう。ウルベアの魔の手より\n 余を救ってくれたのは そちたちじゃな。\:
I see...so it was you who saved me from
Urbea's clutches. Worry not. I shall see
you rewarded for your service.

21392.「い いきなり出てきて エラそうに……。\n アンタ いったい 何者でごぜえます:
J-just who do you think you are...popping
out of this junk like that?!

21393.「これは 異なことを……。\n ドワーフでありながら 余を知らぬとな？\n ……:
How odd... You are a fellow Dwarf, yet you do
not know who I am? Well, it matters not.
I am a magnanimous man, after all.

21394.「ならば 我が名を聞いて おそれおののくのだ！\n 余は かのガテリア皇国の 正:
Hear my name and tremble in fear! I am Byan
DaoーFirst Prince and rightful heir to the
throne of Gateria!

21396.「あ…あまり反応が ないな。\n ……まあ よい。余は 寛大じゃからな。:
H...hardly any reaction at all...
Well, no matter. I am a magnanimous man,
after all.

21397.「おおっ！ そうじゃッ！\n こうしては おれん！\n 囚われの リウ老師を救わ:
Oh, yes! I don't have time for this!
I must save Master Liu!

21398.「そち！ 奇妙な身なりをしているものの\n なかなか ウデが立つと見たぞよ。\n:
You there! Despite your appearance, you have
a sense of...competency about you. I have a
favor to ask of one such as you.

21399.「じつはな ウルベア地下帝国には\n 余の家庭教師をつとめる リウという男が\n:
Deep within the Urbea Empire, my tutor
Master Liu is being held prisoner just as
I was.

21400.「そこで 余を ウルベア地下帝国まで導き\n リウ老師を救出する 手助けをしてく:
As much as I dread returning to that place,
I can't possibly leave him behind. If you
accompany me there, you shall be rewarded.

21401.「うむ！ 苦しゅうない！\n そち 名は なんと申す？\n ……そうか <pc>:
Yes. You may rise!
Would you tell me your name.
I see...so you are <pc>.

21402.「それでは <pc>よ！\n 反重力飛行装置を 持ってまいれ！\n ウルベアまで:
Then let us be off! Get your Anti-Grav
flying machine ready, as Urbea is only
a quick flight away!

21404.「……コホン。どうした？\n 反重力飛行装置を 知らぬわけではあるまい？\n ほ:
...Ahem. Is it something I said? You DO know
about the Anti-Grav machines, yes? The ones
that let you freely soar through the skies?

21405.「まさか……！\n ここには 反重力飛行装置がないと申すか！？<yesno><c:
You mean to say...that there's no such
machine here?!<yesno><close>

21406.「ちょっと 元ポツコン２号さん！\n この部屋にあるのは ガラクタだけで\n そ:
Pardon me, Ex Junkey #2! The only thing we
have here is junk. Nothing useful or
convenient, and certainly nothing that flies!

21407.「言われてみれば 確かに……。\n ここにいる者の身なりは 相当 貧相……。\n:
Hmm...now that you mention it...
Everyone here does look quite shabby...
As I thought, this must be the slums, then.

21408.「すまぬ。余の配慮が 足りなかったわ。\n ならば いたしかたなし。\n 地下帝:
My apologies. I was foolhardy and made
assumptions about your status. We shall
go on foot to the city instead.

21409.「それでは <pc>よ。\n ウルベア地下帝国まで 案内を頼む。\n 余は そち:
Please lead the way there, <pc>.
I will follow right behind you.

21410.「ウルベアに着いたら 地下を目指すのじゃ。\n 地下３階辺りにある 奥まった部屋:
When you reach the city, make your way to
the lowest floor. My master should be in a
chamber in the very back.

21411.「……ムムッ！\n そちは 下々の者の依頼を たくさん抱えており\n 余の頼みは:
...What's this?! It seems you're too burdened
with requests from other common folk to help
with mine.

21412.「……まあ よい。余は 寛大じゃからな。\n とはいえ 事態は 一刻を争うのじゃ:
Well, no matter. I'm a magnanimous man.
However, this situation is time sensitive.
Don't dally too long with your other requests.

21413.「なんと！ 余の頼みを 断ると申すか！\n 我がガテリア皇国の威光を\n おそれ:
What?! You'd refuse my request?!
Do you truly not fear the glory of the
Gateria Empire...?!

21414.「……まあ よい。余は 寛大じゃからな。\n とはいえ 事態は 一刻を争うのじゃ:
Well, no matter. I'm a magnanimous man.
However, this situation is time sensitive.
Do return if you change your mind.

21415.「おお 待っておったぞ！\n ここにいる者に まともに話せる者はおらぬ。\n 頼:
Oh, you've returned! Trying to talk with these
two is like trying to talk to a stone wall.
You are my only hope.

21416.「じつはな ウルベア地下帝国には\n 余の家庭教師をつとめる リウという男が\n:
Deep within the Urbea Empire, my tutor
Master Liu is being held prisoner just as
I was.

21417.「そこで 余を ウルベア地下帝国まで導き\n リウ老師を救出する 手助けをしてく:
As much as I dread returning to that place,
I can't possibly leave him behind. If you
accompany me there, you shall be rewarded.

21418.「じつはな ウルベア地下帝国には\n 余の家庭教師をつとめる リウという男が\n:
Deep within the Urbea Empire, my tutor
Master Liu is being held prisoner just as
I was.

21419.「そちには 余を ウルベア地下帝国まで導き\n リウ老師を救出する 手助けをして:
I need you to lead me there and help me to
rescue him.

21420.「ウルベアに着いたら 地下を目指すのじゃ。\n 地下３階辺りにある 奥まった部屋:
When you reach the city, make your way to
the lowest floor. My master should be in a
chamber in the very back.

21421.「反重力飛行装置がないのは\n いささか不便じゃが いたしかたなし。\n 地下帝:
The lack of any Anti-Grav machines is quite
inconvenient, but there's no use dwelling on
it. We'll just have to go there on foot.

21422.「それでは <pc>よ。\n ウルベア地下帝国まで 案内を頼む。\n 余は そち:
Please lead the way to the
city, <pc>.
I will follow right behind you.

21423.「ハア ハア……。待ちや <pc>。\n いったい どれほど 余を歩かせるのじゃ:
(pant, pant) Please...wait a moment. Just
how far to you intend to have us walk? I'm
not cut out for this sort of thing, you know!

21424.「ところで <pc>よ。\n そちは 来る場所を まちがえておらぬか？:
And more importantly...
Have you led me to the wrong place?

21425.「進めども 進めども ガレキの山……。\n 余の知っておる ウルベア地下帝国は\:
Nothing but rubble no matter where I look...
Covered in dust and forgotten by time...
Is this truly the Urbea Empire?

21426.「深く 広く 掘られた空洞には\n 虹色に輝く宝石で 装飾された家屋が並び\n:
Where are the canyons, dredged by Dwarven machines? The ornately decorated houses covered in jewels? Not to mention...there's
not a single Anti-Grav machine in sight...

21427.「のう <pc>よ。\n ここが その大陸随一の大国と うたわれた\n ウルベア:
<pc>... You mean to tell me that
THIS sorry heap is Urbea, the greatest
nation this continent has ever known?!<yesno><close>

21428.「ならば なぜ かような場所に\n 余を 連れてきた！\n 連れてきたには それ:
Then why did you bring me to such a place?!
You'd better have a good explanation!

21429.「これは異なことを……。余は 信じられぬ。\n あの 栄華を誇った地下帝国が\n:
I simply cannot believe it... The splendor
of Urbea...why does it look like this?!

21430.<pc>は ビャン・ダオに\nこの場所が ウルベア地下帝国の\n遺跡であることを:
<pc> explains to Byan Dao that this
place is the ruins of the Urbea Empire.

21431.「なん…じゃと……！？\n ここは ウルベア地下帝国の遺跡じゃと？\n 遺跡とい:
What did you say...?! "Ruins"?! This place
is the ruins of Urbea? If what you say is
true, then...

21432.「ウルベアは すでに滅んで……\n このありさまに……。:
Urbea has already fallen...
And now this is what remains of it...

21433.「なんということじゃ……。\n 余は…… 余は かの帝国が滅びるまで\n 魔神兵:
What is... So I... I was asleep inside of
the Aztech while the empire met its end...?

21434.「な ならば ガテリアは どうじゃ！？\n <pc>よ！ そちは ガテリア皇国の:
T-then what of Gateria?! Tell me!
Do you know what fate befell that
kingdom?<yesno><close>

21435.「おおっ！ 知っておると申すか！\n ならば 余に 話してみい！\n ガテリアは:
Oh! So you know of it! You must tell me!
What has become of Gateria?!

21436.「…………………………。\n 何も 答えられぬではないか。\n クチから出まかせ:
.......
You do not know, do you? I do not wish
to hear any more lies!

21437.「……そうか。何も 知らぬのじゃな。\n すなわち ガテリアも ウルベア同様\n:
I see...so you really don't know, then.
It means that Gateria met the same
fate Urbea did...

21438.「父上も 母上も もう……。\n そんな…… そんな…………。:
My father, and my mother...
They're... No...

21439.「……すまぬ。一国の皇子である 余が\n 情けない姿を さらしてしもうた……。\:
My apologies. This is no way a prince such
as myself should be acting. Please forgive
me.

21440.「だが そちの話を聞いて\n あらゆることに 合点がいったわ。:
But after hearing everything you told me,
it all makes sense to me now.

21441.「下々の者が ガテリアの威光に ひれふさぬのも\n 反重力飛行装置を 目にしない:
None of the common folk show their respect
to me, I've yet to see an Anti-Grav machine,
and everyone dresses so strangely...

21442.「すべて 時の流れの中で\n 我らの文明が 失われてしまったため……。:
All because our civilization was lost to
time...

21443.「……つまりは グルヤンラシュ！\n きゃつの思い通りになったということか……！:
So, that means... Guryan Rush!
Things went exactly the way you wanted
them to, didn't they?!

21444.「……<pc> そちに聞かせたい話がある。\n 余が この時代に来る前の話じゃ…:
There's a story I'd like to tell you...
It happened before I ended up here.

21445.「かつて この大陸には ふたつの大国があった。\n 余が 国王となるはずだった:
There once existed two great nations on this land. There was the kingdom of Gateria, in which I was to become rulerーand this
place, the Urbea Empire.

21446.「ふたつの国は 他の種族を圧倒する技術力を有し\n そこに住まう者たちは なに不:
Both had technology that far surpassed that
of other races. Their inhabitants lived in
peace and harmony.

21447.「あの乱世の使者 奸臣グルヤンラシュが\n ウルベア地下帝国に 現れるまでは……:
Until that messenger of chaos and treacherous
minister appeared within Urbea... Guryan Rush!

21448.「グルヤンラシュは 高潔な神官の身なりで現れ\n ウルベア皇帝に取り入ると\n:
Guryan Rush appeared in the guise of a noble priest, and won the trust of Urbea's emperor. That's when he manipulated the two nations
into conflict.

21449.「その戦いの中 多くの技術者が散り\n たがいの技術と技術が ぶつかり合って\n:
In the midst of that war, many of our great minds were lost...and as technology clashed with itself, our civilization slowly crumbled
away...

21450.「……そう！ 我らの文明の喪失は\n すべて グルヤンラシュの奸計によるもの！\:
That's right! It was the machinations of the wicked Guryan Rush that led to the loss of our civilization and the destruction of both
nations!

21451.「……そして 行き過ぎた 戦いの果てに\n 余は 命の危険に さらされた。\n:
...And just when the war was nearing its end,
my life was put into peril. Master Liu was
the one who saved me.

21452.「父上も母上も もう生きては いまい。\n じゃが リウ老師だけは\n 今も ど:
Both of my parents are long gone, this I do
know... But I believe that Master Liu still
lives.

21453.「老師は 余が この時代に来る前に\n 余の後を追って 魔神兵に乗ると\n 約束:
He promised that he would follow alongside
me by entering an Aztech of his own.

21454.「じゃが ここに老師は いない様子……。\n 余は ひとまず あのガラクタ屋敷に:
But it appears he is not here... For now, I
will return to that junkpile of a house and
ponder what I should do next.

21455.「<pc>よ これは ほうびじゃ。\n この時代に価値があるかは わからぬが\n:
This is the reward I promised, <pc>.
I know not if it has any worth in this time,
but please take it.

21456.「<pc>……。\n そちは 信頼に値する者だと わかった。\n 余が 困ったと:
I have found you to be one worthy of my trust.
If I am ever in trouble, I hope that you will
lend me your hand once more.

21457.「リウ老師……。\n そなたは どこへ行ったのだ？\n 余を 時の激流に 押しや:
Where have you gone, Master Liu...?
To leave me to be swept away by the
currents of time...
